name: Pyro's Tower
description:
Ascend Pyro's Tower one level at a time to complete the Final Test set by the Pyromancies Council. 

Cast fire spells wisely to graduate from Apprentice to Master Pyromancer!

Discover all manner of fire and water such as ice cubes, boilers, water barrels and fuses as you endeavour to solve each level and progress to the next.

Fill pits, traverse bridges, unlock doors as you navigate your way through. 

Use water as a shield from the heat.

Master the art of timing as you dodge fire balls as they deflect around the room and traverse wind tunnels!
